response: "{ \"title\": \"Easy: Sum of All Substrings\", \"description\": \"Write a function that calculates the sum of all substrings within a given string. The string may contain only lowercase letters and spaces.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef substring_sum(s: str) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `s` (str): A string containing only lowercase letters and spaces.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the sum of all substrings within the input string.\", \"code\": \"def substring_sum(s: str) -> int:\\n    total_sum = 0\\n    for i in range(len(s)):\\n        for j in range(i+1, len(s)+1):\\n            substring = s[i:j]\\n            if substring != '':\\n                total_sum += sum(ord(c) - 96 for c in substring)\\n    return total_sum\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert substring_sum('hello') == 52\", \"assert substring_sum('world') == 54\", \"assert substring_sum('abc def') == 51\"] }"
